articles.author: Delfin Dioquino
articles.title: Gilas to start FIBA World Cup qualifiers with back-to-back games vs Korea - Rappler
articles.description: Gilas Pilipinas will tangle with Korea twice in the first window of the FIBA World Cup Asian Qualifiers in November
articles.content: Gilas then will face India and New Zealand again on June 30, 2022, and July 3, 2022, respectively, in the third window to wrap up the first round.

articles.title: Vietnam braces for long battle as Covid-19 cases, deaths rise in Asean - The Star Online
articles.description: New Covid-19 cases and related deaths were up for the second successive day in Southeast Asia on Friday, collated data showed.
articles.content:

articles.title: vivo named top 5G smartphone brand in Asia Pacific for 2021 2Q - manilastandard.net
articles.description: Leading smartphone brand vivo has been named the top 5G smartphone vendor in Asia Pacific for the second quarter of 2021 according to global market solutions company Strategy Analytics Inc.

articles.title: Only Tony Leung could 'powerfully break the cliche of the moustache-twirling villain': Shang-Chi director Destin Daniel Cretton - AsiaOne

articles.title: Chinese team says quantum physics project moves radar closer to detecting stealth aircraft - AsiaOne
articles.description: Quantum particles in a man-made electromagnetic storm bounced back after hitting stealth object, increasing chance of detection, according to Tsinghua University team.
